snippet: The Kennedy Center bestowed its highest honor Sunday on Dustin Hoffman, the ballerina Natalia Makarova, the blues guitarist Buddy Guy, the talk-show host David Letterman and Led Zeppelin.
abstract: John F Kennedy Center for Performing Arts recognizes actor Dustin Hoffman, ballerina Natalia Makarova, blues guitarist Buddy Guy, talk-show host David Letterman and band Led Zeppelin at its 35th Annual Kennedy Center Honors for lifetime achievement.

byline.original: By EMMARIE HUETTEMAN and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

lead_paragraph: The Kennedy Center bestowed its highest honor Sunday on Dustin Hoffman, the ballerina Natalia Makarova, the blues guitarist Buddy Guy, the talk-show host David Letterman and Led Zeppelin.

headline.seo: Kennedy Center Honors for 4 Performers and a Rock Band
headline.main: Ballet, Rock, the Blues and Acting Share Honors
headline.print_headline: Ballet, Rock The Blues And Acting Share Honors
